name: Native Hunter
description:
Inspired by a REAL indigenous tribe, where they live on an island called "North Sentinel Island" where they are completely isolated from society. Until then, we know almost nothing about what they do to survive, their language or even their culture. Native Hunter gives the player the possibility of living the experience in the body of an indigenous person completely isolated from society. Where it will only have available resources found in nature, and then all of this will be in your hands to survive the way you want against other players, animals or even indigenous tribes that roam the open map.

Inside the game you will find several fragments of history scattered in the form of cave paintings, which will guide you to the path of initiation of the tribe you want to become a member of. And then after finishing all the necessary tasks, the character will gain specific characteristics, related to special skills of creation and physical appearance. All of this will happen online with other players on the server, if you choose to play Online!

Who dictates the rules of what to do in the game is you! In an open world map, there are huge possibilities for interactions or exploration where nothing will hold you back in a monotonous story, as actions are taking place at all times throughout the map!

BUILDING, RESOURCE GATHERING AND CRAFT


There are several structures that you can manufacture to build houses, this ranges from foundations to paintings and decoration chairs, giving the player the possibility of creating large constructions where they bring comfort, or even a fortified base to defend against enemies that can find you anytime!

And for you to be able to build these structures, as well as many other items available in the game, you need to collect resources found in nature according to the need for each item.

With an advanced gathering and crafting system, more than 100 items are available for crafting at the start of Early Access, as well as advanced workbenches that provide crafting for advanced consumable items or refined equipment.

CULTIVATION AND DOMESTICATION


In addition to the wild animals found on the map, there is also the possibility of taming animals and thus making them able to reproduce. But for this to work it will be necessary to leave them fed and safe in your home, there are special structures such as fences and small doors to create these enclosures.

In order to feed these animals, you can plant and cultivate different vegetables, which can be consumed, suppressing your hunger and even giving you special effects for a short period of time. The mechanics have an advanced cultivation system, with the use of water and fertilizer during the maturation period.

SURVIVE


You are responsible for its survival, the character will feel the need to constantly feed and hydrate himself, so it is necessary for you to become a true hunter! Hunt, fish and build. You need to utilize every available means in nature to survive.

EXPLORE


The map has a huge space available for exploration, ranging from large islands with underground caves, to lost ruins at the bottom of the ocean. You are free to decide what to do and how much to do in this huge open world map, we are constantly working on developing this experience, so that it becomes even more attractive!
